title: Team-Profile-Generator
description: A command-line application that generates a HTML webpage displaying a company's team members information.

title: Mykul-README-generator
description: This is a command-line application that generates a professional README file for a new project using Node.js and npm.

title: TrendTube
description: TrendTube is a web application designed for news exploration, providing users with a dynamic combination of news articles and related YouTube videos. This project uses two APIs to deliver real-time content.

title: EM-Weather-Dashboard
description: A simple web application that displays current weather information and a 5-day forecast for a given city.

title: EM-Work-Day-Scheduler
description: This is a simple calendar application that enables users to manage their daily schedule effectively.

title: EM-Coding-Quiz
description: This coding quiz is designed to test your coding knowledge within a limited time frame.
